review: If you have a Mac of any kind, don't get this game.It will not work. Usually it gets to the tutorial, but after you click 'Done', the game crashes.

A few things:This game can disconnect you at will which is extremely annoying. It's fun as all hell. And rail guns are ♥♥♥♥ing ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥t because they can kill you from half way across the world like it's nothing.
Get extremely powerful upgradesGet to floor before MomAlmost beat bossStray shot hits me, dead.10/10 would play again
